Vision

My ultimate life goal is to advance humanity through technology guided by philosophy. While it's inevitable that we, including myself, will someday die, I firmly believe that creating something valuable for humanity and our descendants is a lasting and meaningful legacy. Contributing to humanity's progress is, to me, the most essential and worthwhile direction one can take.


Technology is like magicâ€”it's been having the power to transform the world. I believe the next major leap forward will be in Brain-Machine Interfaces. When we achieve the ability to seamlessly connect our minds with cutting-edge computers, it will accelerate progress across all fields and bring humanity closer to its highest potential.


I'm not driven by money; I'm driven by technology, meaningful connections, and this vision. I aspire to embody the "fierce nerd," dedicating myself to locking away distractions and working relentlessly on something that truly matters.
